page.title: 04Communications
page.content: The Postal Service makes one delivery each day and collects mail twice daily. There is one sub-post office and there are four telephone kiosks in the area. Most houses have their own phones and there is a Telecommunication sub-station in the area. The post is delivered by van in the most inaccesible areas and by post men or women who also play a large part as carriers of news within the community. They are also very valuable as watchdogs for the elderly and report on the sick and infirm.
